name: UpdateSessionRecording
description:
Partially update session recording details.

Use this tool to partially update details of a session recording within a specific project environment. It should be called when modifications are needed for an existing session recording without replacing all current data.

parameters.name: session_recording_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the session recording to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project to access. Obtain it by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: update_session_recording_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details to partially update a session recording. Includes fields like id, distinct_id, viewed, recording_duration, and more.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this session recording.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
